Becareful of this download.  The movie itself is fantastic a/v 10/10 but stuffed up my system it wouldn't let me burn dvd's anymore so I had to delete the movie do a systems restore uninstall n re-install programs ect....It was a MAJOR HEADACHE it wasn't very nice 2 have someone upload something that has a REAL NASTY LITTLE SURPRISE waiting 2 jump out n stuff ur computer.
This download stuffed my computer.  Movie was great but i had to do alot of things to restore my system back to working order.  THIS DOWNLOAD IS A MAJOR HEADACHE.......
Izzzie is talking rubbish.  More like his computer died and needed a rebuild from someone other than him becuase he has no idea about what cuased it to die and need a techie to fix it
